mapper.select: select count(*) from hv_member,hv_sns where hm_id=hs_id

select * from (select rownum as rn, hs_no, hs_id, hs_title, hs_text, hs_date from (select * from hv_member, hv_sns where hm_id=hs_id order by hs_date )) where rn <=#{start} and rn >=#{end} order by rn desc
select * from hv_member,hv_sns where hm_id=hs_id and hs_id like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by hs_date
select * from hv_member,hv_sns where hm_id=hs_id and hs_title like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by hs_date
select * from hv_member,hv_sns where hm_id=hs_id and hs_text like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by hs_date
mapper.update: update hv_sns set hs_title=#{hs_title}, hs_text=#{hs_text} where hs_no=#{hs_no}
